thread.title: Mighty Quinn: October 16
thread.title_full: Mighty Quinn: October 16 - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Mighty Quinn: October 16
text:
The Mighty Quinn
The Mighty One himself.
Gerry Roche reports there are at least two Carolina Panthers fans that live in Rosedale, Queens:
“Dear Mighty, I thought you might like to know, Rosedale kid has done very well. Dean Marlowe, who was born and raised in Rosedale, went to your alma mater St. Clare, played football for the Rosedale Jets and recently played in his first NFL game as a safety for the Carolina Panthers.
“Dean played for Coach Tom Pugh at Holy Cross H.S. (Class 2010). Coach Pugh had told me years ago that Dean was the best athlete he ever coached. As usual, Coach Pugh was right. Dean’s parents, who are both members of the NYPD, must be very proud, as is everyone from Rosedale. I hope all is well with you. I'll talk to you soon. Gerry Roche.
“P.S.: Congratulations to Coach Tom Pugh on retiring this year after 40 years as head football coach of Holy Cross H.S.”
Mighty was waiting on the Mets on Thursday and likes the Blue Jays on Friday. The deficit is 888 sirignanos.
